name: Bungee Jump
details: Bungee jumping is an activity that involves a person jumping from a great height while connected to a large elastic cord.

name: Zip Lines
details: From tropical zip lines in the Caribbean to flights over old-growth forest in Alaska, discover some of the best zip lines in the world.

name: Canoeing
details: A canoe is a lightweight narrow water vessel, typically pointed at both ends and open on top.

name: Kayaking
details: Kayaking is a great sport for beginners since once you get the basic skills down, you can get started right away
